articles.title: Florida shark attacks: Woman and two girls injured at beaches - BBC.com
articles.description: One woman was said to have had part of her arm amputated after being bitten, while two girls were also attacked.
articles.content:
Beachgoers in the Gulf Coast of Florida have been told to be vigilant, after three swimmers were attacked by sharks in two separate attacks.
One woman was said to have had part of her arm amputated … [+2491 chars]

articles.title: Elden Ring's Massive Shadow of the Erdtree DLC Doesn't Have Any Trophies on PS5, PS4 - Push Square
articles.content: Shadow of the Erdtree, the massive Elden Ring expansion that's releasing on the 21st June, won't bring any new Trophies to the open world RPG. This info comes from the ever-reliable PlayStation Game … [+823 chars]
